TopicTitle: Can’t Attach Decoupler to Inflatable Heat Shield in VAB

Articles.Content:
The title is self explanatory.

Newest Version of KSP 2

Intel Core I7

Ram: 16gb

RTX 3050 laptop gpu

Windows 11

Edited April 7, 2023 by BowlerHatGuy3
Added Specs

Cannot attach one to the top? Or 'to the bottom' as we could in KSP 1?

Except that it's lead to / aligned with other bugs (about to be reported) the way I stuck an inflatable shield "in-line" on my craft was with an Engine Plate... Decoupler > Engine Plate > Inflatable shield > another Decoupler. [though ~40% of my craft's part-count is struts]

15 hours ago, Flush Foot said:

Cannot attach one to the top? Or 'to the bottom' as we could in KSP 1?

Except that it's lead to / aligned with other bugs (about to be reported) the way I stuck an inflatable shield "in-line" on my craft was with an Engine Plate... Decoupler > Engine Plate > Inflatable shield > another Decoupler. [though ~40% of my craft's part-count is struts]

Its the bottom for me.

5 hours ago, BowlerHatGuy3 said:

Its the bottom for me.

I don't know if this is a bug or a design decision... that's why I went with the Engine Plate [kind of like a KSP 1 interstage fairing]
